recordAudio: Functions to operate the v2 on-board microphone and speaker.
recordAudio.audioDuration: Get the how long the recorded audio clip is
recordAudio.audioIsPlaying: Get whether the playback is active
recordAudio.audioIsRecording: Get whether the microphone is listening
recordAudio.audioIsStopped: Gets whether the board is recording or playing back
recordAudio.play: Play the audio clip that is saved in the buffer
recordAudio.playAudio:
Play any recorded audio
* @param sync If true, block until complete
recordAudio.setMicrophoneGain: Set amplification of the microphone input
recordAudio.startRecording:
Record an audio clip
* @param sync If true, block until we run out of memory!
